title: Tomás Segovia (footballer)
text:
Tomás Segovia (born 6 de mayo 1995) is an Argentine professional <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> for <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Sansinena%20Social%20y%20Deportivo">Sansinena</a>.
Career.
Segovia began his career in <a href="Chacarita%20Juniors">Chacarita Juniors</a>' ranks. He was moved into the team's senior squad midway through the <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Argentine%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">2017–18 Argentine Primera División</a> campaign, making his professional debut on 27 April 2018 during a loss at home to <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Temperley">Temperley</a>. That was his sole appearance in 2017–18, though he was an unused substitute on two occasions, as Chacarita Juniors were relegated to <a href="Primera%20B%20Nacional">Primera B Nacional</a>.
